content: lion stands approx 6 5 tall by 6 long based on suggested material skill level beginner basic skills required include but are not limited to crocheting in the round single double and triple crochet stitches increasing and decreasing color changing working in back loops pattern contains written instructions materials list email support and photos this pattern and accompanying photographs are protected under international copyright law and may not be distributed translated or posted for sale or free in any way this pattern is for personal use only please do not distribute reproduce share or sell this pattern you may sell finished items made from this pattern though only in small quantities provided you credit the original design wholesale is not allowed
